attributes.action: support the speedy construction of the aberdeen bypass by the year 2012 to attract investment to the grampian region and to ensure businesses can access their markets in a speedy and safe manner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the aberdeen bypass was originally proposed in 1946 but it wasnt until march 2003 that the scottish parliament gave the go ahead for the bypass to be constructed , unfortunately due to the number of satutory consultations that had to be adressed the completion date for the bypass has fallen behind schedule . may i ask your good offices to ensure that the new timetable is adhered to.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
